casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Carl Douglas ST. JOHN. No. 638P02-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 24, 2008. Anne M. Middleton, Assistant Attorney General, James C. Gaither, Jr., District Attorney, for State. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th day of December 2007 by Defendant on Writ of Certiorari to the N.C. Supreme Court: "Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 24th day of January 2008." HUDSON, J., recused.
